hdhr.comment: IP address of your HDHomeRun tuner device

directories.comment: Directory paths for storing recordings and media. Use ~ for home directory or absolute paths

ffmpeg.comment: Path to ffmpeg executable. Use 'ffmpeg' if it's in your PATH, or full path to executable

prowlarr.comment: Prowlarr integration settings for torrent searching. Set enabled to true and provide API key to use

biratepay.comment: BiratePayment integration for premium content access

epg.comment: Electronic Program Guide settings. zip_code determines your TV market. Leave headend_id empty for auto-detection.
